pages.title: Pigment Pedestal
pages.text: The $(bold)Pigment Pedestal$() is the block where you craft most of the recipes for Spectrum.$(br2)To start crafting trigger it with a $(l:general/paintbrush)Paintbrush$() or supply a $(thing)redstone signal$().$(br)It requires air or an inventory above it.

$(br)Most recipes require $(l:general/gemstone_powder)Gemstone Powder$() as an ingredient.$(br2)The Pedestal also acts as a $(item)Crafting Table$() and can therefore also be used to craft vanilla recipes.$(br2)You can use a $(l:magical_items/crafting_tablet)Crafting Tablet$() to automate both Spectrum and Vanilla recipes.

pages.title: Variants
pages.text: $(br)The Pigment Pedestal can be built with your gemstone of choice.$(br2)While they do look different they are the same, functionally.
